description:
A BGM pack that includes music from past titles in the "Atelier" series.
BGM can be changed from the diary on the desk in Ryza's room or from the desk in her atelier.

[Content]
 - Atelier Marie
 - Atelier Elie
 - Atelier Marie, Elie, & Anis
 - Marie & Elie ~Our Atelier~
 - Atelier Lilie
 - Hermina and Culus
 - Atelier Judie
 - Atelier Viorate
 - Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana
 - Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny
 - Atelier Iris 3: Grand Phantasm
 - Mana Khemia
 - Mana Khemia 2
 - Atelier Rorona
 - Atelier Rorona Plus
 - Atelier Totori
 - Atelier Meruru
 - Atelier Ayesha
 - Atelier Escha & Logy
 - Atelier Shallie
 - Atelier Sophie
 - Atelier Firis
 - Atelier Lydie & Suelle
 - Atelier Lise
 - Atelier Annie
 - Atelier Lina
name: Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack
